channel.title: Experience on Kyobito's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Experience on Kyobito's Portfolio

item.title: Freecodecamp
item.description: I’ve completed the course Scientific Computing with Python on the Freecodecamp website and have completed 5 projects along with it. This amounts to 300 hours worth of coursework.

item.title: NCSF Finalist 2021
item.description: I was named a National Cyber Scholarship Finalist in 2021 as a freshman in high school.

item.title: SANS Foundations
item.description: I took and completed a course, offered by SANS Institute, named Foundations: Computers, Techonology & Security.
